Name: Fumizuki
Displacement:
1,336 t (1,315 long tons) (normal)
1,800 t (1,772 long tons) (deep load)
Range: 4,000 nmi (7,400 km; 4,600 mi) at 15 knots (28 km/h; 17 mph)
Armament:
4 × 12 cm (4.7 in) Type 3 guns
2 × triple 61 cm (24 in) torpedo tubes
18 × depth charges
16 × mines
Operations:
Battle of the Philippines
Battle of Java
Solomon Islands campaign
New Guinea campaign
Operation Hailstorm
